page.title: 17CRUDWELL -MRS THORNE'S LIFE
page.content: {Mrs Thorne}is seventy nine years old. She has{lived in Crudwell for sixty {four years}and has{played the organ}in Crudwell church{for sixty years.}Mrs Thorne loves Crudwell very much.Mrs Thorne's parents were very strict with her and she was only allowed to play in her backyard or go straight to the shops and back again.Her best friend was May Summerton.Mrs Thorne told us that on her birthday all the money she received was five pence.She looked forward to her birthday very much all year round.{Mrs Thorne was in the {choir}and enjoyed this.{She still {rides her bike around Crudwell.}When she was younger she rode seven miles to Cirencester regularly for exercise and to visit her teacher for piano practice.
